DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , single-center study healthy volunteer establish PT/INR reference interval Microvisk International Normalized Ratio ( INR ) Test System . The primary objective study establish reference interval measurement prothrombin time ( PT/INR ) use Microvisk INR Test System . The second objective evaluate safety device .
DOC.brief_title: PT/INR Reference Interval IN Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy volunteer meet eligibility criterion , fully inform provide write informed consent enrol study . Each participant require donate 3 finger stick sample test one occasion . The maximum trial duration participant one visit/occasion . This follow standard venipuncture ( 1 ) neutral tube ( Red Top ) analysis on-test method , ( 1 ) one sodium citrate tube ( Blue Top ) analysis comparative/reference laboratory method . Sample collection take place within clinic session . The maximum trial duration participant one clinic session .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject consider healthy volunteer 2 . Subject male female , 18 year age 3 . Subject inform give ample time opportunity think his/her participation give his/her write informed consent 4 . Subject agree blood drawn ( venipuncture ) finger stick 1 . Subject unable give inform consent 2 . Subject le 18 year age 3 . Female subject pregnant 4 . Subject anticoagulant medication medication know affect PT/INR assessment ( e.g. , warfarin , heparin ) minimum 28 day enrol trial 5 . Subject medical condition know affect PT/INR ( e.g . vitamin K deficiency , disseminate intravascular coagulation , liver disease , decrease defective factor I , II , V , VII , X ) 6 . Subject already take part study
